Question.Subject: What is a good free e-mail client with few users?
Question.Content: I'm trying to get an email address with just my name, but my name is too common to get one on the big clients (yahoo, gmail, hotmail, etc). I hate having numbers in my email address, so does anyone know any sites that offer free e-mail, yet have few enough users that I might be able to get a good email address?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I used inbox.com - they were pretty good. Not as big as the others but have been around a while...you can try it out.

Answer.Content: I used inbox.com - they were pretty good. Not as big as the others but have been around a while...you can try it out.
